name: intentionally-blank
description: This theme was intentionally left blank. There are times when all you need is the WordPress dashboard and an blank frontend.

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../intentionally-blank.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json phpcs.xml.dist

author: Creative Sizzle
